Cmd.CmdDesc: Sets the advertising parameters

ParmItem.ParmHint: Answers to both connect and scan requests
Answers only to connect requests; smaller advertising interval for quicker connection
Does not answer to connect nor scan requests
Answers only to connect requests; larger advertising interval

Parm.ParmDesc: Indicates whether the advertising address will be the public address or the random address
Address type of the peer; only used in directed advertising and Enhanced Privacy
Bit mask indicating which of the three advertising channels will be used - default all three
Indicates whether the connect and scan requests are filtered using the White List - default does not use White List

ParmItem.ParmHint: Accept all connect and scan requests
Accept all connect requests, but scan requests only from devices in White List
Accept all scan requests, but connect requests only from devices in White List
Accept connect and scan requests only from devices in White List

Parm.ParmDesc: Boolean value which indicates if scanning parameters are included or not

ParmItem.ParmHint: Passive Scanning - advertising packets are immediately reported to the Host
Active Scanning - the scanner sends scan requests to the advertiser and reports to the Host after the scan response is received

Parm.ParmDesc: Indicates whether the address used in scan requests will be the public address or the random address - default public address
Indicates whether the advertising packets are filtered using the White List - default does not use White List

ParmItem.ParmHint: Scans advertising packets using the White List

Parm.ParmDesc: Indicates whether duplicate advertising report filtering is enabled. For BLE 5.0 adds the possibility to reset filtering for each scan period

ParmItem.ParmHint: Scans advertising packets using the White List
Duplicate filtering enabled, reset for each scan period

Cmd.CmdDesc: Commands the controller to stop scanning
Connects to a scanned device

Parm.ParmDesc: Indicates whether the connection request is issued for a specific device or for all the devices in the White List - default specific device

ParmItem.ParmHint: Initiates a connection with a specific device identified by its address
Initiates connections with all the devices in the White List at the same time

Parm.ParmDesc: Indicates whether the address used in connection requests will be the public address or the random address - default public address
When connecting to a specific device, this indicates that device's address type - default public address
When connecting to a specific device, this indicates that device's address
The minimum desired connection interval - default 100ms
The maximum desired connection interval - default 200ms
The desired connection latency (the maximum number of consecutive connection events the Slave is allowed to ignore) - default 0
The maximum time interval between consecutive over-the-air packets; if this timer expires, the connection is dropped - default 10s
The minimum desired connection event length - default 0ms
The maximum desired connection event length - default maximum possible, ~41 s
TRUE if the address defined in the peerAddressType and peerAddress is an identity address
